messages.content: APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) exist because they provide a way for different software applications to communicate with each other. This allows developers to reuse code and build new applications that can work with existing tools, without having to start from scratch.
That means the most productive way to create a useful app is to combine apis

Yes, combining APIs can be a good way to create a useful app. By combining APIs, developers can create a more complete and convenient solution for users. For example, a messaging app could use an API to access a database of users' contacts, and a map app could use an API to access a database of locations. By combining these APIs, the app can provide a more comprehensive service to users.
what is the physical configuration of an api

The physical configuration of an API refers to the structure and layout of the data that the API provides. APIs are typically designed to be used by other software applications, so they need to be designed in a structured and organized way.
